snippet: Giovanni and Lucia Guarini inherited a castle filled with battle weapons, dusty heirlooms and family portraits. And then they got some paint.
abstract: Italian couple Giovanni and Lucia Guarini renovate his family's 17th-century Palazzo Guarini, castle in Puglia region of Italy, into a space that combines its historic roots with modern style.
lead_paragraph: Giovanni and Lucia Guarini inherited a castle filled with battle weapons, dusty heirlooms and family portraits. And then they got some paint.

headline.main: The Vibrant Makeover of a 17th-Century Palace
